author: aheritier
msg: We can't use Java 1.5 in the integration server.
We are using Java 1.4 to be sure to keep the backward compatibility

author: ningjiang
msg: Changed the JettyHTTPServerEngine's finalizeConfig to be public scope to support configuring the engine in a programmable way

author: trustin
msg: Applied Java 5 covariant return type to IoConnector.defaultRemoteAddress

author: trustin
msg: * Renamed protected methods in AbstractIoService, AbstractPollingIoProcessor and their subclasses
* Added final modifier to avoid API abusing
